title: How to Make Absurdly Easy Chocolate Cake

steps.headline: Mix the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Pour the smooth mixture into the prepared cake pan.
Place in the oven to bake for 40 minutes or until a skewer comes out clean when tested.
Allow to cool before serving.
steps.description: Eat and enjoy. Frost it if wished but it is delicious without and healthier too.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC. Prepare the cake pan. Mix the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl.  Add the wet ingredients. Stir through. Pour the smooth mixture into the prepared cake pan.  Place in the oven to bake for 40 minutes or until a skewer comes out clean when tested.  Allow to cool before serving. Eat and enjoy. Frost it if wished but it is delicious without and healthier too.
